query.name: query
query.data: <chart palette='2' labelDisplay='WRAP' formatNumberScale='0' bgColor="FFFFFF" subcaption='<#if month??>${month}</#if>' caption="月收入趋势" showValues='1' showLabels='0' decimals='0' useRoundEdges='0' legendBorderAlpha='0' canvasBorderThickness='1' numberPrefix="$" showBorder='0' lineColor="FCB541"> <set label='Jan' value='17400' /> <set label='Feb' value='19800' /> <set label='Mar' value='21800' /> <set label='Apr' value='23800' /> <set label='May' value='29600' /> <set label='Jun' value='27600' /> <set label='Jul' value='31800' /> <set label='Aug' value='39700' /> <set label='Sep' value='37800' /> <set label='Oct' value='21900' /> <set label='Nov' value='32900' /> <set label='Dec' value='39800' /> <set label='Jan' value='17400' /> <set label='Feb' value='19800' /> <set label='Mar' value='21800' /> <set label='Apr' value='23800' /> <set label='May' value='29600' /> <set label='Jun' value='27600' /> <set label='Jul' value='31800' /> <set label='Aug' value='39700' /> <set label='Sep' value='37800' /> <set label='Oct' value='21900' /> <set label='Nov' value='32900' /> <set label='Dec' value='39800' /> <set label='Jan' value='17400' /> <set label='Feb' value='19800' /> <set label='Mar' value='21800' /> <set label='Apr' value='23800' /> <set label='May' value='29600' /> <set label='Jun' value='27600' /> <set label='Jul' value='31800' /> <styles> <definition> <style name='captionFont' type='font' size='14' color='000000' bold='1' /> <style name='msubCaptionFont' type='font' size='12' color='000000' bold='1' /> <style name='myDataLabes' type='font' size='12' color='000000' /> </definition> <application> <apply toObject="caption" styles="captionFont" /> <apply toObject="TOOLTIP" styles="msubCaptionFont" /> <apply toObject="YAXISNAME" styles="myDataLabes" /> <apply toObject="Legend" styles="myDataLabes" /> <apply toObject='DataLabels' styles='myDataLabes' /> </application> </styles> </chart>
